title: Computer Science Honor Society
description: A service organization to promote Computer Science
longDesc: CSHS encourages studentsâ€™ enthusiasm for computer science, honors academic excellence, and promotes service.

testimonyArr.name: Anonymous
testimonyArr.testimony: CSHS is an amazing way to serve the community, build a college application, and make a difference while doing what you enjoy. It's fun to go to elementaries and teach kids about computer science

title: HSE Apps
description: Learn to program apps, no experience needed
longDesc: Club mentors will lead groups to program apps over the semester. The club will also host their own "hackathon" where members will get a programming challenge and build a solution within a short time frame.

testimonyArr.name: Anonymous
testimonyArr.testimony: HSE Apps is a fun way to socialize with fellow nerds... It's great to learn about programming

title: Girls Who Code
description: A coding club for Girls, no experience needed
longDesc: Join a sisterhood of supportive peers and role models using computer science to change the world.
